Description.Name: Is now a good time?
Description.Details: You wander in the lounge for a drink and hopefully some relaxing music. As you find a vacant table and sit down, you notice [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] ordering a pitcher of what you know is [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[Lore_GhostBeer],Ghost Beer]]. {TGT_MW.Subj_C} {TGT_MW.Gender?NonBinary:see|Default:sees} you, and begins to make {TGT_MW.Obj} way over to your table. "Greetings, Commander {COMMANDER.FirstName} {COMMANDER.LastName}, I have not seen you here in some time. May I join you?" You smile and wave at the vacant chair, "Please, by all means." [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] takes a seat and holds up the pitcher of [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[Lore_GhostBeer],Ghost Beer]], "You would share this we me, quiaff?" Recollecting that last time you drinks with [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] and the two day hangover that followed, you put on your best face and smile, "Sure, why not?" [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] fills both of the tankards to the rim and slides one over to you. You both cheers the glasses, and where you take a modest sip, the Ghost Bear Khan sitting across from you drains over half the tankard. As {TGT_MW.Subj} sets his tankard down, a seriousness passes across {TGT_MW.Det} face, "If I may be so bold, have you had a chance to consider my request, Commander." "I have not forgotten your request, but remind me, which system in particular are we needing to travel to?" you ask. [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] calmly looks you straight in the eyes, "I still cannot divulge that information until you give me your word that you will assist, Commander."

Description.Name: Postponed
Description.Details: You calmly look over at [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]], "Look, I appreciate your request and the addition of a clan assault mech to the company would be amazing, but we have too much on our plate to even attempt a recovery mission right now. I hope you understand." The silence lingers and you begin to feel a bit intimidated as [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]]'s unwavering stare bores into you. A few seconds later, a huge smile spreads across {TGT_MW.Det} face as {TGT_MW.Subj} picks up the pitcher of [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[Lore_GhostBeer],Ghost Beer]] and refills both tankards, "You are the Commander, and you have declared we wait. We shall wait until the time is right Commander, quiaff?" You reluctantly grab your tankard and clink it against his raised tankard, "Aff, MechWarrior."

Description.Name: Give it to me baby!
Description.Details: Maybe it's the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[Lore_GhostBeer],Ghost Beer]] talking, but you are intrigued by the thought of having a 100 ton Kodiak at your disposal, and with an experienced pilot to boot. You take another small sip of your drink and smile, "Ok [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]], let's say I agree to your request. You understand that heading out to clan space will take time, so this will not be a fast turn around mission?" [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] smiles and nods, "Aff, Commander. Ultimately, I am placing my faith in you honouring your word to assist me. In return, I will give my all to any missions I drop for {COMPANY.CompanyName}." "Okay MechWarrior, you have my word. We will at some point head out to clan space to retreive your Kodiak. Do you trust me enough to provide the name of the star system? [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] finishes {TGT_MW.Det} drink and sets the tankard down on the table, "We need to go to Arcadia. A very remote location in the southern hemisphere to be a bit more precise. When we arrive in system, I can provide more exact coordinates." You lean forward, hand extended, "This is where I think I should respond with, Bargained well and done." A massive grin spreads across [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]]'s face as {TGT_MW.Subj} nearly breaks your outstretched hand with {TGT_MW.Det} grasp, "Aff, Commander! Bargained well and done!" You bid your farewell and stagger back to your cabin, the effects of just one tankard of [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[Lore_GhostBeer],Ghost Beer]] nearly buckling your knees. You hope the inevitable hangover doesn't last too long while you ponder how the hell [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] can still function after polishing of nearly that whole pitcher.
